sql_generation.input_text: 统计每个部门的员工数量，按数量降序排列
sql_generation.output_text: {"sql": "SELECT department, COUNT(*) as employee_count FROM employees GROUP BY department ORDER BY employee_count DESC;", "explanation": "按部门分组统计员工数量并降序排列", "estimatedRows": "部门数量"}

sql_generation.input_text: 查询销售额超过10000的订单信息，包含订单号、客户名称和销售额
sql_generation.output_text: {"sql": "SELECT o.order_id, c.customer_name, o.total_amount FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE o.total_amount > 10000;", "explanation": "关联查询订单和客户表，筛选销售额大于10000的记录", "estimatedRows": "符合条件的订单数量"}
sql_generation.description: 关联查询和条件筛选示例

sql_generation.input_text: 计算每个月的销售总额，显示月份和对应的销售额
sql_generation.output_text: {"sql": "SELECT DATE_FORMAT(order_date, '%Y-%m') as month, SUM(total_amount) as monthly_sales FROM orders GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(order_date, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY month;", "explanation": "按月份分组统计销售总额，使用DATE_FORMAT函数格式化日期", "estimatedRows": "月份数量"}
sql_generation.description: 日期函数和时间聚合示例

sql_generation.input_text: 查找最近30天内注册的新用户数量
sql_generation.output_text: {"sql": "SELECT COUNT(*) as new_users FROM users WHERE created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY);", "explanation": "使用DATE_SUB函数计算30天前的日期，统计新注册用户数量", "estimatedRows": "1"}
sql_generation.description: 日期计算和时间范围查询示例

sql_generation.input_text: 查询每个产品类别的平均价格和产品数量
sql_generation.output_text: {"sql": "SELECT category, AVG(price) as avg_price, COUNT(*) as product_count FROM products GROUP BY category ORDER BY avg_price DESC;", "explanation": "按产品类别分组，计算平均价格和产品数量，按平均价格降序排列", "estimatedRows": "产品类别数量"}
